The investigator hypothesize Immediate placement IUD postpartum period result 20 % decrease continuation rate six month compare Interval placement . Secondary outcome measure obtain include : - Pain time placement - Postpartum Depression - Breastfeeding status - Postpartum weight retention - Expulsion Rates - Bleeding Profile - Uterine Infection ( Endometritis )
DOC.criteria: All woman > 37 week gestation desire LNGIUS postpartum contraception contraindication describe offer participation study . Contraindications LNGIUS include : Pregnancy suspicion pregnancy Congenital acquire uterine anomaly include fibroid distort uterine cavity Postpartum endometritis within past 3 month Known suspected uterine cervical neoplasia unresolved , abnormal pap smear untreated acute cervicitis vaginitis include bacterial vaginosis lower genital tract infection acute liver disease liver tumor hypersensitivity component product know suspected carcinoma breast Any condition would exclude patient receive form contraception study . In addition follow intrapartum finding , follow would exclude patient : Delivery < 37 week Intrapartum chorioamnionitis ( defined maternal fever > 100.4 two follow condition : Maternal leukocytosis ( great 15,000 cells/cubic millimeter ) , Maternal tachycardia ( great 100 beats/minute ) , Fetal tachycardia ( great 160 beats/minute ) , Uterine tenderness , Foul odor amniotic fluid Postpartum Hemorrhage ( define > 500cc EBL spontaneous vaginal delivery > 1000cc cesarean delivery )
